siteMetadata.title: rantum.dev
siteMetadata.subtitle: digital dwelling of andrew maury. digital developer @ecomloop in burlingame, ca. san matean nantucketer on a rantum scoot.

frontmatter.title: Do not let fear of irrelevance prevent publishing projects
frontmatter.description: Do not let fear of irrelevance prevent publishing projects. It's a natural fear and it shouldn't be ignored.

frontmatter.title: Find edges of knowledge and adapt for new uses
frontmatter.description: There's so much to learn in the world and knowledge is progressing at a faster rate than normal. In areas of interest, get up to speed, then work to identify edges of knowledge and contribute in small ways. Do this in the public to foster best sources and views on topics, then cross with others topics of interest and knowledge.
